title: How to Draw Fashion Eyes

steps.headline: Draw the head and divide it in 3 parts.
steps.description: Find the middle of the second section and mark it.

steps.headline: Divide the latter line in 3 parts leaving some space from the sides for the temples.
Draw lines to indicate where the eyes are going to be.
Close the eyes shapes by tilted lines.
Soften the edges of the eye shapes
Draw the pupil in the middle 1/3 of the eye.
Finish the eye by adding some eyelashes following the existing guidelines.
steps.description: Don't forget to mark the tear duct.

steps.headline: Add eyebrows and the rest of the face features.

text:
Draw the head and divide it in 3 parts. Find the middle of the second section and mark it. Divide the latter line in 3 parts leaving some space from the sides for the temples. Draw lines to indicate where the eyes are going to be. Close the eyes shapes by tilted lines. Soften the edges of the eye shapes Draw the pupil in the middle 1/3 of the eye. Finish the eye by adding some eyelashes following the existing guidelines. Don't forget to mark the tear duct. Add eyebrows and the rest of the face features. Here is the finished illustration:{"smallUrl":"https:\/\/www.wikihow.com\/images\/thumb\/a\/a3\/Draw-Fashion-Eyes-Step-8Bullet1.jpg\/v4-460px-Draw-Fashion-Eyes-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","bigUrl":"\/images\/thumb\/a\/a3\/Draw-Fashion-Eyes-Step-8Bullet1.jpg\/aid1627250-v4-728px-Draw-Fashion-Eyes-Step-8Bullet1.jpg","smallWidth":460,"smallHeight":345,"bigWidth":"728","bigHeight":"546","licensing":"
